casebody.data:
PEOPLE State of Illinois, respondent,
v.
Kory MAXFIELD, petitioner. No. 123036 Supreme Court of Illinois. March 21, 2018

Petition for Leave to Appeal Denied.

In the exercise of this Court's supervisory authority, the Appellate Court, First District, is directed to vacate its judgment in People v. Maxfield, case No. 1-15-1965 (11/07/17). The appellate court is directed to consider on direct appeal defendant's claim that his trial counsel was ineffective for failing to move to suppress evidence and quash.
